Reviews.Title: Pentax Q
Reviews.Author: Alvin K. Trace "Tracer"
Reviews.Content: Love the camera!  A great little in a small package.  I also have a Pentax K-01 and the Q has a lot of the same specs in a smaller.  It's features are pretty amazing considering the size.  Great build quality.  Also, love the HDR settings. It was shipped quickly and the price was right.

Reviews.Title: it is cheap and very small
Reviews.Author: Zhengxiu Jin
Reviews.Content: this camera is very small, so it is convenient to take it and it looks beautiful. but the pictures taken by the camera is not better than windows phone

Reviews.Title: im in love!
Reviews.Author: andrea
Reviews.Content: I'm really in love with this camera!!its beautifull, i use it all time, i can carry it in my bag.lovely photos, perfect Size Camera!!

Reviews.Title: It's so cute!!
Reviews.Author: Max
Reviews.Content: I've been dying for this camera for the longest. The only thing keeping it from receiving a 5-star rating is the fact that it sometimes, not always but sometimes, lags when a take pictures. I think I just have to keep messing with it consistently to keep it from doing that.

ProductInfo.Features:
12.4 megapixel backlit CMOS sensor producing very low noise images @ high levels of sensitivity for both 12 bit DNG RAW and JPG files.
New Pentax Q mount lens system supporting 5 different lenses
Full HD video capture @ 30 FPS with h.264 compression
Sensor shift shake reduction with DRII dust reduction for stabilized blur and dust free images
3X 27.5 -83mm equivalent zoom lens
ProductInfo.Name: Pentax Q White kit w/02 Standard Zoom Lens
